DOC.brief_title: Clinical Feasibility Birth- Track II System
DOC.criteria: 1 . Laboring woman refer Maternity Center active labor ( 3cm dilatation contraction ) . 2 . Gestational age 3742 week . ( GA ) 3 . Single fetus 4 . Subjects understood , agree sign informed consent form 1 . Women abnormal placentation ( placenta previa ) 2 . Abnormal fetal presentation ( breech presentation ) 3 . Maternal History HIV and/or blood transmit hepatitis and/or active genital Herpes . 4 . Need immediate delivery ( cord prolapse suspected placental abruption )
